response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and worth to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and craftsmanship. I understand that its true value might be subjective and varies from person to person. Considering the unparalleled nature of this product, I am extending to you the chance to own it at a special price of $650,000. I believe this offers a fair balance between the intrinsic value of the product and the potential appreciation of its worth under your ownership. Should you find this proposal appealing, I would be more than happy to discuss further details and facilitate the transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 650000}
